articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Mexican GP reduces F1 paddock crowds to avoid security issues - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Organisers of Formula 1's Mexican Grand Prix have worked to reduce the number of fans in the paddock to avoid a repeat of 2022's security issues.
articles.content:
The number of fans and VIPs in the paddock in last year's race at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez led to security issues, with spectators crowding hospitality units and accosting drivers.

articles.title: Borussia Dortmund team bus gets parking fine in Tynemouth - BBC.com
articles.description: The German Bundesliga club beat Newcastle United 1-0 in Wednesday's Champions League tie.
articles.content:
The Borussia Dortmund team bus has been slapped with a £50 fine while parked up in Tynemouth.
